channel.title: Biyka R Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Biyka R Blog

item.title: Registered vehicles on UK roads
item.description: This is a trial first post using blogdown. dat %<>% melt(value.name = "Vehicles") dat %>% ggplot(aes(x=Year, y=Vehicles, fill=variable),stat = identity) + geom_col() + theme_bw() + coord_flip()
